articles.description: The Record has reported how Thompson was filmed dancing on stage alongside fellow former player Bobby Petta and actors Martin Compston and Gianni Capaldi.
articles.content:
Former Celtic star Alan Thompson says he did not sing about the Irish Republican Army while firing up a crowd of Hoops fans at a Celtic fan event in Las Vegas.

articles.title: "Maverick" Becomes Cruise's Biggest Hit - Dark Horizons
articles.description: Paramount and Skydance’s “Top Gun: Maverick” has become Tom Cruise’s highest-earning film at the worldwide box office (not adjusted for inflation). Through Thursday, the film has collected $806.3 million worldwide – $422.1 million domestically and $384.2 mill…

articles.author: Andrew Pulver
articles.title: Jean-Louis Trintignant, star of A Man and a Woman and Amour, dies aged 91 - The Guardian
articles.description: The veteran of the French new wave starred in a series of auteur-driven films, before appearing in Michael Haneke’s Amour
articles.content:
Jean-Louis Trintignant, the French actor closely associated with the European new waves of the 1960s and 70s, has died aged 91. His wife, Mariane Hoepfner Trintignant, announced the news to AFP.
